content: ‚ö°Ô∏è We‚Äôre proud to launch a BOUNTY PROGRAM‚ö°Ô∏èPrize pool: $40 000 worth $ANIF tokensWhile ANI.Finance team is preping all the gear for private sale, you have a chance to get tokens FOR FREE! For this mission, you‚Äôre free to use any info from our site. ‚ùóÔ∏è ONLY original content will be accepted ¬† ‚ùóÔ∏èFor every video about ANI that gets at least 1,000 views we‚Äôll give you 20 stakes.Every that gains 10,000 views or more you‚Äôll get 100 stakes.3Ô∏è‚É£ Follow our Twitter and Telegram and post at least 3 tweets about ANI with $ANIF and #ANIFBounty hashtags.üí∞‚ùì How to get your rewards?
